description:
This is an early clip from tomorrow's podcast release with Dan Williams. In it, he and Dr. Jordan B. Peterson discuss the institutional capture that has plagued Canada from academia to the colleges which govern licensed professionals.

Unlock the ad-free experience of The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast and dive into exclusive bonus content on DailyWire+. Start watching now: http://dwpluspeterson.com/yt

title: How Is Canada the Epicenter of the Opioid Crisis? | Dan Williams
